GSD.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SCALANCE M-800 / S615 (All versions), SCALANCE SC-600 family (All versions < V2.3.1), SCALANCE W-1700 IEEE 802.11ac family (All versions), SCALANCE W-700 IEEE 802.11ax family (All versions), SCALANCE W-700 IEEE 802.11n family (All versions), SCALANCE XB-200 switch family (All versions), SCALANCE XC-200 switch family (All versions), SCALANCE XF-200BA switch family (All versions), SCALANCE XM-400 Family (All versions), SCALANCE XP-200 switch family (All versions), SCALANCE XR-300WG switch family (All versions), SCALANCE XR-500 Family (All versions). Affected devices do not properly sanitize an input field. This could allow an authenticated remote attacker with administrative privileges to inject code or spawn a system root shell.

product_data.product_name: SCALANCE XC206-2G PoE EEC (54 V DC)

description_data.value: Affected devices do not properly sanitize an input field. This could allow an authenticated remote attacker with administrative privileges to inject code or spawn a system root shell.

description.value: CWE-74: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')

description_data.value: Affected devices do not properly sanitize an input field. This could allow an authenticated remote attacker with administrative privileges to inject code or spawn a system root shell.
